column1:
CONVERSATIONAL DOCUMENT IDE - DETAILED JOURNEY FLOWS

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

FLOW 1: DOCUMENT CREATOR - FIRST PROJECT
End-to-End Experience (30-45 minutes)

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 1. DISCOVERY & SIGN UP (2-3 min)                                │
│                                                                  │
│ Landing Page → Value Prop → Sign Up CTA                        │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ • Reads: "Turn documents into conversations"                    │
│ • Sees: Demo video or sample conversation                       │
│ • Clicks: [Start Free] button                                   │
│ • Fills: Email + password OR OAuth                             │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ DECISION POINT: Trust sufficient to create account?             │
│ • YES (80%): Proceeds to dashboard                             │
│ • NO (20%): Bounces                                            │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 2. FIRST PROJECT SETUP (3-5 min)                                │
│                                                                  │
│ Dashboard → [+ New Project] → Upload Interface                  │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ • Names project: "IP Framework for Board"                       │
│ • Drags 3 files: IP.pdf, Financial.xlsx, Market.docx          │
│ • Sees: Upload progress bars                                    │
│ • Waits: Processing indicator                                   │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ ANXIETY POINT: "Will it understand my docs?"                    │
│ • System provides: Real-time upload feedback                    │
│ • System shows: "Processing... 2 of 3 complete"                │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 3. AI ANALYSIS & VALIDATION (1-2 min)                          │
│                                                                  │
│ Analysis Screen → Review Summary → Confirm                      │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ AI presents:                                                    │
│ "I've analyzed your 3 documents. They appear to cover:          │
│  • IP strategy and market positioning (25 pages)                │
│  • Financial projections with 35% ROI over 18 months           │
│  • Competitive landscape analysis                               │
│                                                                  │
│ Key sections I identified:                                      │
│  - Section 3.2: ROI Analysis                                    │
│  - Section 4: Risk Mitigation                                   │
│  - Appendix: Competitive Matrix"                                │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Creator reactions:                                              │
│ • "Wow, it actually understood!" (70% impressed)               │
│ • "Close, but not quite right" (25% need refinement)           │
│ • "This is garbage" (5% drop off)                              │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ DECISION POINT: Continue or abandon?                            │
│ • Continues (90%): Impressed by analysis                        │
│ • Drops off (10%): Quality concerns                            │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 4. AGENT CONFIGURATION INTERVIEW (10-15 min)                   │
│                                                                  │
│ Chat Interface → Progressive Q&A → Build Context               │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ ESSENTIAL QUESTIONS (5 min - 80% completion):                   │
│ AI: "Who will you be sharing these with?"                       │
│ Creator: "My board members and key investors"                   │
│                                                                  │
│ AI: "What communication style works best?"                      │
│ Creator: "Professional but approachable"                        │
│                                                                  │
│ AI: "What should I emphasize?"                                  │
│ Creator: "ROI projections, risk mitigation, timeline"          │
│                                                                  │
│ AI: "Can I make reasonable inferences?"                         │
│ Creator: "No - stick to what's explicitly stated"              │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ OPTIONAL DEEP DIVE (5-10 min - 40% complete):                  │
│ AI: "What questions do you anticipate?"                         │
│ Creator: "Timeline concerns, competitive positioning"           │
│                                                                  │
│ AI: "Any sensitive topics?"                                     │
│ Creator: "Legal risks - handle carefully"                       │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ SATISFACTION POINT: "It's learning my needs"                    │
│ • Progress bar shows 80% essential complete                     │
│ • Can skip remaining or continue                                │
│ • Most (60%) skip after essentials                             │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 5. AGENT PREVIEW & APPROVAL (3-5 min)                          │
│                                                                  │
│ Preview Interface → Test Interactions → Refine or Approve       │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Creator sees configured agent in action:                        │
│ AI: "Hi! I'm here to help you understand the IP framework      │
│      documentation. I've been configured to focus on ROI        │
│      projections and risk mitigation strategies..."            │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Creator can:                                                    │
│ • Ask test questions                                            │
│ • Review configuration summary                                  │
│ • Edit settings                                                 │
│ • Approve and continue                                          │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ CONFIDENCE POINT: "This will represent me well"                 │
│ • 80% approve immediately                                       │
│ • 15% make minor edits                                          │
│ • 5% start over                                                 │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 6. SHARING CONFIGURATION (5-7 min)                             │
│                                                                  │
│ Share Modal → Access Settings → Generate Link                   │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Configures:                                                     │
│ • Access level: ☑ Email Required                               │
│ • Expiration: 30 days                                           │
│ • Password: Optional                                            │
│ • Whitelist: john@investor.com, sarah@fund.com                 │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Receives:                                                       │
│ • Unique share link: app.com/s/xyz123                          │
│ • QR code for mobile                                            │
│ • Pre-written email template                                    │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ ANXIETY POINT: "Will they actually engage?"                     │
│ • Sends link via email                                          │
│ • Waits for access notifications                                │
│ • Hopes for good impression                                     │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

FLOW 2: BOARD MEMBER - FIRST VIEW
End-to-End Experience (15-25 minutes)

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 7. ACCESS & FIRST IMPRESSION (1-2 min)                         │
│                                                                  │
│ Email → Click Link → Access Gate → Entry                        │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Receives email:                                                 │
│ "John shared IP Framework docs with you. View with AI chat."    │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Clicks link → Lands on access gate:                            │
│ "Please provide your email to access"                           │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Mental state:                                                   │
│ • Curious: "What is this?"                                      │
│ • Cautious: "Is this secure?"                                   │
│ • Busy: "This better be worth it"                               │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ DECISION POINT: Provide email or bounce?                        │
│ • Provides email (70%): Curious enough                          │
│ • Bounces (30%): Friction too high                             │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 8. INITIAL CONVERSATION (15-20 min)                            │
│                                                                  │
│ Chat Welcome → Ask Questions → Review Docs → Deeper Dive        │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ AI greets:                                                      │
│ "Hi! I'm here to help you understand John's IP framework        │
│  documentation. I've been configured to focus on ROI            │
│  projections and risk mitigation. What interests you most?"     │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ MOMENT OF TRUTH: First question                                 │
│ Board Member: "What's the projected ROI?"                       │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ AI responds + auto-opens doc:                                   │
│ "According to the Financial Projections (Section 3.2),         │
│  the projected ROI is 35% over 18 months..."                    │
│ [Document panel opens, scrolls to Section 3.2, highlights]     │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Board Member reaction:                                          │
│ • "Wow, this is actually helpful!" (60% engaged)               │
│ • "Interesting, let me explore" (30% cautious)                 │
│ • "Not impressed" (10% bounce)                                 │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Conversation continues:                                         │
│ Q: "What are the main risks?"                                   │
│ Q: "Show me competitive analysis"                               │
│ Q: "What if regulatory approval delays?"                        │
│ Q: "How does timeline compare to industry?"                     │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Documents open automatically:                                   │
│ • Risk section highlighted                                      │
│ • Market analysis displayed                                     │
│ • Timeline charts visible                                       │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ ENGAGEMENT CRESCENDO: Getting value                             │
│ • Asks 5-8 questions total                                      │
│ • Spends 15-20 minutes                                          │
│ • Reviews 2-3 documents                                         │
│ • Gains clear understanding                                     │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 9. CONVERSION OPPORTUNITY (1-2 min)                            │
│                                                                  │
│ Modal Appears → Value Prop → Decision                           │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Modal shows:                                                    │
│ "Save this conversation?                                        │
│  • Save conversation and AI summary                             │
│  • Return anytime for follow-ups                                │
│  • Get notified of updates                                      │
│  • Create your own doc experiences"                             │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Board Member considers:                                         │
│ • Just had valuable experience                                  │
│ • Might want to reference later                                 │
│ • Minimal friction to sign up                                   │
│ • Sees potential for own use                                    │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ DECISION POINT: Create account?                                 │
│ • Creates account (40%): Sees value                            │
│ • No thanks (60%): One-time use sufficient                     │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ IF NO ACCOUNT:                                                  │
│ • Conversation data logged for creator                          │
│ • Can't save or return                                          │
│ • Lost follow-up opportunity                                    │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ IF ACCOUNT:                                                     │
│ • Conversation saved                                            │
│ • Summary PDF generated                                         │
│ • Email confirmation sent                                       │
│ • Potential future creator                                      │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

FLOW 3: CREATOR - ANALYTICS & ITERATION
Post-Share Experience (Ongoing)

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 10. ANALYTICS REVIEW (Daily check-ins, 5-10 min each)          │
│                                                                  │
│ Email Notification → Dashboard → Review Insights                │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Receives email:                                                 │
│ "john@investor.com viewed your IP Framework docs"               │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Logs into dashboard:                                            │
│ • Overview: 12 views, 8 conversations, 156 avg seconds         │
│ • Recent: John's conversation 23 min ago                        │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Reviews AI-generated summary:                                   │
│ "Key Topics:                                                    │
│  • Financial projections (8 min) - deep interest               │
│  • Risk mitigation (7 min) - concerned about delays            │
│  • Timeline (5 min) - questioned 18-month projection           │
│                                                                  │
│ Questions Raised:                                               │
│  1. 'What if regulatory approval delays 6 months?'             │
│     → Concern about contingency planning                        │
│  2. 'How does this compare to competitor X?'                   │
│     → Interested in competitive positioning                     │
│                                                                  │
│ Action Items:                                                   │
│  • Prepare contingency timeline document                        │
│  • Schedule follow-up on competitive analysis"                  │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ INSIGHT MOMENT: "I know exactly what they care about"           │
│ • Sees patterns across conversations                            │
│ • Identifies common concerns                                    │
│ • Understands what resonates                                    │
│ • Can prepare better for meetings                               │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│ 11. ITERATION & IMPROVEMENT (Weekly, 10-20 min)                │
│                                                                  │
│ Analytics → Identify Gaps → Update Agent → Refine Docs          │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Notices patterns:                                               │
│ • 3 people asked about regulatory timeline                      │
│ • 2 people wanted competitor comparison                         │
│ • Everyone spent time on risk section                           │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Takes action:                                                   │
│ 1. Updates agent configuration:                                 │
│    • Adds: "Proactively address timeline concerns"             │
│    • Emphasizes: "Regulatory contingency planning"             │
│                                                                  │
│ 2. Adds supplementary document:                                 │
│    • "Regulatory_Timeline_FAQ.pdf"                              │
│    • "Competitive_Positioning.docx"                             │
│                                                                  │
│ 3. Refines existing content:                                    │
│    • Expands risk mitigation section                            │
│    • Adds timeline buffer explanation                           │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ Generates new share link:                                       │
│ • For next round of stakeholders                                │
│ • With improved agent                                           │
│ • With better documentation                                     │
│ ↓                                                               │
│ OPTIMIZATION LOOP: Continuous improvement                       │
│ • Each conversation provides insights                           │
│ • Each iteration improves experience                            │
│ • Stakeholder satisfaction increases                            │
│ • Meeting prep becomes more efficient                           │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

KEY DECISION POINTS & CONVERSION FUNNELS

CREATOR ACTIVATION FUNNEL:
Landing → Sign Up → Upload → Configure → Share → Monitor
  100%      80%      95%      90%        95%      85%
  
DROP-OFF POINTS:
• Sign up: 20% (trust/value unclear)
• Upload: 5% (technical issues)
• Configure: 10% (complexity/time)
• Share: 5% (hesitation)
• Monitor: 15% (passive users)

VIEWER CONVERSION FUNNEL:
Access → Engage → Complete → Convert
  100%     70%      90%       40%

DROP-OFF POINTS:
• Access: 30% (friction at gate)
• Engage: 10% (poor first impression)
• Convert: 60% (no immediate need)

RETENTION DRIVERS:
• Analytics insights (85% return rate)
• Positive viewer feedback (90% continue)
• Time saved vs traditional sharing (75% report >2 hours saved)
• Meeting quality improvement (80% report better prepared meetings)
